claim_card.claim: The paper flags testable hooks: anomalies in high-Φ regimes (frame-dragging-like effects) and analog simulation via reaction–diffusion systems.
claim_card.test_hook: Propose one analog reaction–diffusion experiment and one astrophysical high-Φ observational signature; pre-register expected directionality.
claim_card.evidence_excerpt: Suggested testable predictions, such as frame-dragging-like anomalies in high-Φ regimes and analog simulation in reaction–diffusion systems.
